column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This was my first time at a tapas restaurant. Went here with a group of 4 on a Friday night.  We enjoyed 3 different pitchers of sangria
column2: and all 3 were great!  We ordered 10 hot tapas
column4: and chicken and chorizo skewers were the standouts to me. I wasn't disappointed by any.  Food arrives at a good pace
column5: allows you to really enjoy everything you eat. I would recommend this place to anyone and I will be back!
